idea:
Asi Tattva is a proprietorship firm and we have 3 divisions that are functional and looking for expansion. Apparel division is the oldest and it began 1.6 years ago and we manufacture kids and women semi formal wear clothing and are currently selling through major ecommerce portals in India and locally. Our second division is into furniture and lifestyle products using  scrap and upcycled wood, metal and glass. Our third division is also into waste management where we manufacturer accessories and baby shoes using fabric and leather scraps.

We have our ecommerce portal www.asitattva.com, but we are short handed in using it to our best. The 3 divisions are working parallel and we are looking for avenues to expand the products up cycled divisions. We are also looking forward to proper CA services for us to guide and manage our financial parts. 

I (Mini Bhattacharya) is looking forward to schemes that can help me take my business to the next level and 10x the revenue in the next 1 year.
name: MINI BHATTACHARYA ASI TATTVA LLP

idea: OUR INTENTION IS TO SETUP AN E-COMMERCE PORTAL WHICH WOULD FACILITATE INDIAN HANDICRAFTS WORKERS DIRECTLY WITH THE REST OF INDIA. THIS WOULD ENABLE THEM ACHIEVE THE BEST PRICE FOR THEIR INCREDIBLE ARTWORK.

idea: We want to start the business of Welding electrode manufacturing unit in Mumbai area. name: RUCONSER INDIA

idea:
AMCPL was promoted with an idea to sustain its operations, based on the practice of total quality management and one guiding principal: putting our integrity into action.

AMCPL is a full-service Metal Fabricator & Retail Display Fixture Manufacturer providing a comprehensive range of exceptional quality crafted products. Our market research has taught us that Process Quality governs Product Quality.

Management at AMCPL is trained and equipped to meet the most demanding customer deadlines with a lean and efficient production line. To ensure that each project meets or exceeds our clients' expectations, AMCPL is growing towards making itself self dependent and 100% in-house manufacturing unit, with zero compromising policy for Goods & Services.

The Chairman of our organization, Mr. Vagtaram Choudhary with his able guidance has helped us to achieve and maintain the consistent growth over 4 years and reach the present sustainable stage. In fact, his efficient team management and constant inspirational words motivates the entire workforce and enables them to work in perfect harmony.

AMCPL enjoy the process to create individual parts, assemblies, or large-scale projects.
name: AANJANA METAL CONCEPTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Collegiate is a mobile application to effectively cater all requirements of university,college, students and professors. It has various features through which will act as process improvement and create world class infrastructure for education institutes. 

Collegiate is available on play store.It has more than 5000 registered students in Mumbai and 6 colleges. The number is increasing day by day.
name: SIDDVERSE DIGICOM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are aspirational innovators in the field of consumer electronics. We desire to manufacture in India and promote Indian made good in the International market. Our biggest dream is to develop India as a world factory in making elite class consumer products and promote exports worldwide. India will be recognised as the place of innovation and premium quality production, which will increase the prestige of Indian goods in the world market.
name: Tapase
